summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingHellooo, 90s supermodel hair! The BondiBoost Infrared Thermal Brush creates sleek and bouncy hair. Infrared technology gently heats hair from within, causing less damage than traditional forms of heat while Aloe-infused bristles reduce frizz and add shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsThink of the Infrared Thermal Brush as the perfect date. If it were an IRL person, it would always text you back. It consistently gives sleek and bouncy hairstyles worthy of the catwalk, all without the damaging heatNo red flags here. It’s all possible thanks to infrared technology, which harnesses the power of negative ions to lock in moisture as you style your strands for the glossiest finishInfrared technology gently heats the hair from within, causing less damage than traditional forms of heatIt’s super gentle and can be used on the daily to touch up hair. What a babe, right? Not to mention the aloe-infused bristles add extra shine and reduce frizzy bitsFeaturesUse on dry hair, never wet hairAloe-infused bristles add shine42mm barrel & 360-degree swivel cordInfrared heats up between 120 and 220CCool tip for safe stylingResearch ResultsCause less damage than traditional forms of heat*Give all day volumeIncrease volume by 67% after 1 use*Immediately increase shine by 47% after 1 useImmediately reduce frizz by 35% after 1 use**Based on instrumental testing on hair tressesItem 2620084How To UseAlways start with dry hair.Want sleek and swishy hair? Wrap dry hair around the heated hair brush then slowly glide it down to your ends and curl inwards.Want more volume? Pop the heated round brush under your hair at the roots, then hold in place for 10-15 seconds and slowly glide down to ends.Want more of a wave? Wrap hair around the Infrared Bounce Brush, hold for 10-15 seconds, then twist out for a looser wave finish. Pro tip: wrap hair around rollers and let it set while doing your makeup for the most volume.How To Care For Your ToolTurn off and let it cool downGently slide a comb under hair stuck in the brush bristles to loosen, then pull out by handUse a soft fabric to wipe away any product residueUse an old toothbrush to gently brush product off the bristles
how_to_use: Always start with dry hair.Want sleek and swishy hair? Wrap dry hair around the heated hair brush then slowly glide it down to your ends and curl inwards.Want more volume? Pop the heated round brush under your hair at the roots, then hold in place for 10-15 seconds and slowly glide down to ends.Want more of a wave? Wrap hair around the Infrared Bounce Brush, hold for 10-15 seconds, then twist out for a looser wave finish. Pro tip: wrap hair around rollers and let it set while doing your makeup for the most volume.How To Care For Your ToolTurn off and let it cool downGently slide a comb under hair stuck in the brush bristles to loosen, then pull out by handUse a soft fabric to wipe away any product residueUse an old toothbrush to gently brush product off the bristles

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I really love this product! However I wish I had known about the longer barrel for my longer hair. Wishing I could exchange.

reviews.headline: Not The Best For The Cost
reviews.comments: After using this for about two months, I'm disappointed in the quality of the tool. The bristles are extremely crooked, and there's no way to safely store the tool without that happening. I've also noticed that the bristles will gather a ton of buildup from heat protectant products. It looks like I've been using this tool for years rather than two months. It doesn't look like it's in good shape. I would imagine that due to these issues, that's why my hair doesn't hold the waves very well. I have the type of hair where it'll hold curl extremely well, but it doesn't hold the blowout effect very long.

reviews.headline: Good Thermal Brush
reviews.comments: *I bought this with my own money* Good thermal brush - does what it says and easy to use. I have naturally curly hair and rough dry it with a blow dryer. I then go back in to smooth it out with this brush. My hair is smooth and bouncy afterwards, and the effect is very similar to a blow out. The only con is the power button is located where I typically wrap my hand and I usually hit it several times. However, you have to hold the power button down for 2 seconds to turn it off, so it's not really an issue. If you're wanting to get the effects of a blow out without the hassle, this is a great tool to try!

reviews.headline: Doesn't hold a style
reviews.comments: I bought this thinking i would love it based on reviews. Boy was i wrong! It takes several passes to do a style and boy was it a slowwwwww process. Then when i finjshed styling my hair, my hair would be frizzy and my hair style would be gone! All within 30 min-1 hour. I would have to touch up several times throughout the day. It was simply not attainable to keep that up so I ended up returning it.

reviews.headline: Bristles too short don't hold hair properly
reviews.comments: Bristles do not hold your hair an you have to deal with the area that doesn't have any bristles. Invest in a good flat iron or curling iron.

I have really thick hair, and I usually just like to straighten or curl a little bit of my hair, but still with volume, and this is so perfect! It's so quiet that you can't hear anything. faceoff_positive.comments:
As someone with thick, long hair that reaches down to my hips, finding the right styling tool has always been a challenge. Enter the Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush – an absolute game-changer for my hair care routine.

**Effortless Styling for Thick Hair**
The Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush excels at managing thick hair. Its powerful infrared heat technology penetrates deeply, ensuring that even the densest strands are evenly heated. This results in a smoother, shinier finish that other tools simply can't match. Unlike traditional brushes and straighteners, this brush eliminates frizz and flyaways, leaving my hair looking polished and salon-fresh every time.

**Speed and Efficiency**
Styling long hair can be time-consuming, but the Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush significantly reduces the time I spend on my hair. The brush heats up quickly and maintains a consistent temperature, allowing me to style my entire mane efficiently. The large barrel is perfect for creating volume and waves, which adds a beautiful, natural-looking bounce to my long locks.

**Healthier Hair**
One of the standout features of this brush is its ability to style hair without causing excessive damage. The infrared heat is gentler compared to conventional high-heat styling tools. This means less risk of split ends and dryness, which is crucial for maintaining the health of my long hair. Over time, I've noticed that my hair feels softer and looks more vibrant, a testament to the brush's kinder approach to styling.

**Ease of Use**
Despite its advanced technology, the Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush is incredibly user-friendly. Its ergonomic design makes it comfortable to hold, even during prolonged styling sessions. The brush glides smoothly through my hair without tugging or pulling, and the adjustable heat settings allow for a customized styling experience tailored to my hair's specific needs.

**Versatility**
This brush is not just for straightening; it's a versatile tool that can create a range of styles. Whether I'm going for sleek and straight or voluminous and wavy, the Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush handles it all with ease. This versatility makes it a valuable addition to any hair care arsenal, especially for those with long, thick hair.

**Final Thoughts**
The Infrared Heated Thermal Round Brush has transformed my hair styling routine. Its ability to handle thick, long hair with ease, coupled with the health benefits of infrared heat, makes it an indispensable tool. If you have thick, long hair and are looking for a reliable, efficient, and healthy way to style it, I highly recommend giving this brush a try. Your hair will thank you!
faceoff_positive.headline: Easy and fast

faceoff_negative.comments: I was very hesitant on purchasing this because after using the Blowout Brush Pro I noticed a significant amount of hair breakage and damage- despite using heat protectants. My hairdresser even asked if I had been using one of those blowout brushes bc she could see all the breakage on her clients. I was eyeing this product when it was being promoted in February and when it first came out. I waited to ask my hairdresser what she thought about the new Infrared Bounce Brush and she said to stay away unless I wanted more breakage. I wish I listened to her, but I wanted it to work so bad and I was fooled by all the 5 star reviews. I feel stupid now that I bought into the whole "No heat damage" marketing. Here I am writing a review after 4 months of having this brush and let me tell ya it's not worth it. I only tried using this brush max 2 times a week -when it needed a little pick me up- in the beginning. After about a month I stopped using it as much because I was noticing breakage and more split ends. It made my hair look like it had years of damage and a million fly aways. Absolutely not worth the damage it's caused- extremely disappointed because I really wanted to love this product. Please be aware especially if you have fine or thin hair!!
faceoff_negative.headline: So Much Breakage.
